About the Company: De Nora India Limited provides its valuable customers, not only a superior product, but also technical assistance, in installation and operation of their electrodes, for both, new and retrofitted cells of different technologies, through out their operating life.Product range of the company includes:Chlor-Alkali which makes a full range of products and systems for chlorine and alkali, and sodium and potassium chlorate commodity chemical producers.Oxygen & Specialties designs, develops and manufactures electrodes, anode coatings and systems for several electrochemical applications.DNI Products - Electrochlorination Systems-Seaclor Mac,Solar Mac and BRAVor.
